content: Hi all, I can see the connectathon 23 report here - https://docs.google.com/document/d/14Fp9UwJIo8a2cdXWcM_qQk2H7b2M4ZyLIVcLCUMyWws/edit# , but I recall during the report out presentations, a couple of the tracks had their report elsewhere. Does anyone have a link to those alternate reports (@David Hay ?), or can they be incorporated into the main report? Thanks.
I think that @Sandra Vance is going to consolidate them...
And then will be dragged into confluence for prosperity.
@Brian Postlethwaite I think that would be "posterity"? Although if it could also achieve prosperity, that would be even better! :smile:
Hillarity, perhaps? Uphill, or downhill, that would be the question ..
